posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/10/c3/mmrBMdKT_o.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/EEflOvL.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HACKUMAN SEASON 4[/b][/color]
After a delay for updates and bug-fixes, Hackuman has returned with season 4 and a new HUM. Members can now post their way to an Amethyst Egg [award=195] to hatch the brand new HUM known as "Vise." Double up on Octoberfest by getting your posts for the new award goal as well as claiming some Amethyst eggs to hatch the most powerful Vise you can. Read more about this [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6252681&pid=62094351#pid62094351][i]in this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]OCTOBERFEST 2023[/b][/color]
It's October on Hack Forums, you know what that means. This spooky season the award goal is the Purple Octoberfest Pumpkin [award=196] which is awarded by making 600 posts during the month of October. Spice up your profile and show others you dominate the boards by shooting for this limited time award. Once it's gone, it won't return, get it while you can. More information can be found [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6252663&pid=62093900#pid62093900][i]in this thread[/i][/url].

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v5/census-hydra.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]NFA & GAMERTAGS[/b][/color]
The Non-Free Accounts and Gamertags sections have been merged into the Online Accounts section and the sub-sections were deleted. All content that would've originally fallen into those two sections are now to be posted within the Online Accounts section. You can read the announcement on this change by visiting [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6250893&pid=62074350#pid62074350][i]this thread[/i][/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]FINGERPRINT SIGN-IN[/b][/color]
 [mention=1] has opened discussion about new methods of logging in as an attempt to make it easier for mobile users to access their account. These options include, but are not limited to, fingerprint scans and Personal Identification Numbers (PIN) being used for quickly signing into your account. You can join the discussion to view more details or to let your opinions or suggestions be known by joining the conversation [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6252392&pid=62090647#pid62090647][i]here[/i][/url].

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature.[/align]
